description: LibriSpeech dev-other subset - challenging read English speech for development

source.name: LibriSpeech ASR Corpus
source.citation: Panayotov et al., LibriSpeech: An ASR Corpus Based on Public Domain Audio Books, ICASSP 2015

sample_discovery.notes: Samples are discovered from extracted archive. Each speaker/chapter directory contains .flac files and a .trans.txt file with space-separated ID and normalized transcript.

meta.notes: Development set counterpart to test-other. Use for tuning robustness to challenging acoustic conditions before evaluating on test-other.
